channel.title: How to make people register through your site before playing?
channel.description:
I hope its not to big of a deal to ask for this But I have time all I have is time. ronnielarryownz94@hotmail.com(remove if I'm not aloud to post email) So can someone help me.
and can someone give me a link to how to make a webclient would be very appreciated.

item.title: How to make people register through your site before playing?
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Full Metalst, post:9, topic:253409”]Off-Topic: I did :P.

On-Topic: Ok, kind of like [sarcasm][/sarcasm] tags, but with ‘<>’? Ok I get it. It’s easier than Java though, right?[/quote]Oh yeah, it’s a hell of a lot easier. Although, to make people register through a site before playing you would have to make the server integrated with sql, and code the site in php and sql, which would be hard to do.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make people register through your site before playing?

item.title: How to make people register through your site before playing?
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Full Metalst, post:7, topic:253409”]People say it could be really hard. I lol’d irl too, but I haven’t even tried, so I just felt like saying it’s hard.[/quote]Well don’t misinform people, it’s a hell of an easy language to learn, if you would even call it that. It’s just simple open and closing tags

lol html is so hard

.
